 2012-17272012-12-13,  CH,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNFB-CUPE - Technical category ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the renewal of the COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT between the NATIONAL FILM BOARD AND THE SYNDICAT GÉNÉRAL DU CINÉMA ET DE LA TÉLÉVISION regarding the Technical category. This agreement is for a term of three (3) years from July 1, 2011 to June 30, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
